entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
